quote: Society never made the preposterous demand that a man should think as much about his own qualifications for making a charming girl happy as he thinks of hers for making himself happy.
quote_letters: SOCIETY NEVER MADE THE PREPOSTEROUS DEMAND THAT A MAN SHOULD THINK AS MUCH ABOUT HIS OWN QUALIFICATIONS FOR MAKING A CHARMING GIRL HAPPY AS HE THINKS OF HERS FOR MAKING HIMSELF HAPPY
